cs213.photoalbum.model

Class Album

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs213.photoalbum.model.Album
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Album
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Reference to a users photo album Stores references to photos in the album
    Author:
    Rich Gerdes and Sangini Shah
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • addPhoto

        public void addPhoto(Photo p)
        Adds the photo object to the album. Throws Exception if photo is already present in the album.
        Parameters:
        p - photo object to be added
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - throws exception if photo is already present in album

      • removePhoto

        public void removePhoto(Photo p)
        Removes the specified photo object from the album. Throws Exception if photo is not present in the album.
        Parameters:
        p - photo object to be removed
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - throws exception if photo is not present in album

      • removePhoto

        public void removePhoto(java.lang.String fileName)
        Removes the photo with the specified name from the album.
        Parameters:
        fileName - name of the photo to be removed

      • recaptionPhoto

        public void recaptionPhoto(Photo p,
                           java.lang.String caption)
        Changes the caption of the photo to the provided caption. Throws an exception if the photo is not present in the album.
        Parameters:
        p - photo object to be recaptioned
        caption - new caption photo is to be given
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - throws exception if photo is not present in album

      • recaptionPhoto

                           java.lang.String caption)
        Changes the caption of the photo to the provided caption
        Parameters:
        fileName - name of the photo object that is to be recaptioned
        caption - new caption the photo is to be given

      • hasPhoto

        public Photo hasPhoto(java.lang.String fileName)
        Checks the album to see if it contains the specified photo. If it does, it returns the photo object. Otherwise, it returns null.
        Parameters:
        fileName - name of the photo object to be searched for
        Returns:
        photo object if present in album, otherwise, null

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object o)
        Compares the two album objects. If the names match, then the albums are equal and true is returned. Otherwise, false if returned.
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
